mean_en: a word or group of words, such as in, from, to, out of and on behalf of, used before a noun or pronoun to show place, position, time or method
sentence: Prepositions are usually used before nouns to give additional information.
sentence_trans: 介词通常用在名词前来给出额外的信息。
word_etyma: pre…前的，预先 + position位置 → 位置放在前面 → 前置词，介词
